ADDED NOTE..: well had both cams handy. not alota time so started to work. BOOM!!! Then it's dropped and all the work dun by EVE & Hive. so grabbed Hive's flipped through and thought, has too much red in it for me liking so decided to work on this (as all the work been done already) adjusted rgb, lvls, sharp, noise, gain and a few other tidbits. 

*READNFO* begin audio is pretty loud and abbresive but damn gud with that exception. Cheers to Hive for the lipsync and S4NDM4N for the cap... also in via the screens you can see 2 screen caps the show the difference in vids used. still pretty damn nice copy... cheers to all involved.
